Availability.value: currently sponsored by Rokill Pest Control

Description.value: Sponsor Ashley Heath roundabout to promote your company in St. Leonards and St. Ives , Dorset.   Display your logo and message on all four signs at this location.   Advertising on roundabouts offers you a cost-effective way to raise your company's profile. Roundabout sponsorship promotes your brand and makes a positive contribution to Dorset's landscape.
